readable.title: 3452341579_0147d2199b
readable.content: A dirt bike flies upside down as the rider tumbles toward the dirt . A man has wrecked his racing bike in the dirt with five spectators behind a rope . A person falling off a dirt bike in the middle of a dirt bike race . Bike racer number 661 wrecks on dirt racetrack . The biker falls while the boys watch .
